languages.text: "Искупите вину кровью. Отныне вы — штрафная штурмовая группа".
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
languages.original_text: "Искупите вину кровью. Отныне вы — штрафная штурмовая группа".

traits.locale_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
"You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

languages.text: "Ihr werdet mit Eurem Blut bezahlen. Ab sofort seid Ihr eine kämpfende Strafeinheit."
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet mit Eurem Blut bezahlen. Ab sofort seid Ihr eine kämpfende Strafeinheit."

languages.text: « Vous le paierez de votre sang. Vous formerez désormais une unité pénale d'assaut. »
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

traits.locale_text: « Vous le paierez de votre sang. Vous formerez désormais une unité pénale d'assaut. »

languages.text: «Lo pagaréis con sangre. A partir de ahora sois todos una unidad penal de asalto».
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

traits.locale_text: «Lo pagaréis con sangre. A partir de ahora sois todos una unidad penal de asalto».

languages.text: 「自らの血で贖うことだ。これよりお前たちは刑部突撃部隊だ」
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

traits.locale_text: 「自らの血で贖うことだ。これよりお前たちは刑部突撃部隊だ」

languages.text: “你们要用你们的鲜血来偿还罪过。从现在开始，你们就是判罪先锋军。”
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."

traits.locale_text: “你们要用你们的鲜血来偿还罪过。从现在开始，你们就是判罪先锋军。”

languages.text: "Bedelini kanınızla ödeyeceksiniz. Sizi cezai taarruz birimi ilan ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "You will pay with your blood. From now on, you lot are a penal assault unit."
